item.title: backbone.js + underscore: small intro
item.description: Today, Oleg gave a talk about backbone at Paylogic. We were using it for a really fancy application inside our backoffice, it was quite funny write it and Oleg decided to share the knowledge. I used the techtalk to take some notes and, since this piece of code will have no sense out of our backoffice, I’ve written a small example that you can find as a gist on my github.
